Package com.vectorprint.configuration.annotation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SettingsAnnotationProcessor
    Processes objects or classes looking for fields annotated with Setting or SettingsField, when both are present only SettingsField is processed.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SettingsAnnotationProcessorImpl
    This implementation will try to call a setter for a field first when injecting a value from settings, when this fails the value of the field will be set directly using Field.set(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object).
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Feature
    a feature to use in SettingsField
    PreProcess
    declare preprocessing of settings in SettingsField
    Setting
    A field in an object can obtain its value from settings by annotating it with this annotation.
    SettingsField
